name: Steglacherhof
description: Our recently built, well kept holiday house, in farming surroundings can be found at the opposite of the Zillergrung Hotel. In a quiet position, on the banks of the Ziller river - pure nature! Mayrhofen can be reached by car in 5 minutes. The free ski bus service stops 150metres away from the house, and the regional bus stop is 300 metres away. With that you can easily reach the town centre of Mayrhofen, the lifts and ski regions.
Included in price: Local taxes, Table and bed linen as well as hand towels, final cleaning charge, heating, water and electricity.

Check in: 14.00hr, check out: 09.30hr.
Drive to Mayrhofen, at the roundabout by the railway station, drive 500 metres out of the valley until the turn off on the right for Brandberg/Zillergrund, through the Brandberg-Tunnel, over the wooden bridge in the direction of the Ferienhotel Zillergrund (the Steglacher Hof is opposite), down the river approx. 200m, over the bridge again, and then right until the last house - you are at the Steglacher Hof.
